channel.title: Scala on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Scala on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.title: How Much of "The Kotlin Way" Is the Right Way?
item.description: NOTE: This post was originally intended to provoke a discussion, and despite its length, the original goal is still the same. Please, share your feedback on Twitter, Reddit, or Dev.to. My experience with the JVM dates back from around 2010. Java in those days was a bit different from todays’ standpoint. Java 6 was the current standard at the time, but most projects I got to work on, were stuck between Java 4 and 5.
